title: Coming Available Soon, STUDIO Unit with Patio, Call Now for Details!
posting_body: COMING AVAILABLE SOON by AUGUST 15th , APPLY NOW TO RESERVE STUDIO APARTMENT.!!!
Enjoy living within minutes of downtown Concord and the BART station when you lease this studio model available at Adobe Lake.

Homes in this layout feature well-designed kitchens with white formica counter tops, dishwashers, and refrigerators, along with built-in microwaves in select models Upgraded layouts also include luxury vinyl tile floors, ceiling fans, and window blinds.
For additional convenience, this home comes cable-ready and features generous space in the walk-in closet.
Select apartments also offer tranquil POOL view from your kitchen window.
To unwind, explore the community’s wide range of recreational options, including the swimming pools and serene courtyards with fountains.
You’ll also appreciate the convenient access to on-site laundry centers, covered parking, and 24-hour maintenance or management staff.
Reserve this model when you call Adobe Lake today.
